categories: Category:Lords of the Lost Tribe of Sith

nodes.text: Takaris Yur was a male Human member of the Lost Tribe of Sith on the planet of Kesh in 41 ABY. He was a High Lord on the Circle of Lords, the Tribe's ruling council, and was tasked with running their Sith Temple. Grand Lord Darish Vol considered him ambitious, but not for himself. Rather, he wanted the best he could get for his students. He spoke little, but was listened to when he did.
